Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 6th overall pick, by Seattle in 2022...
Traded from Seattle to Plympton on 4/1/2023 (Going to SEA: P Jack Mack. Going to PWC: LF Carl Zimmerman, P Dioner Alvarez, LF Bob Trowsdale, P Everette Lutz)...
Had first career hit on 4/5/2024, off Fernando Gallion (SPR)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/19/2024, off Grover Mouser (SEA)...
Won Batter of the Month award on 5/1/2025, hitting .439 with 4 HR, 17 RBI...
Was selected to the 2025 Allstar game...
Won World Championship with Plympton in 2025...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/12/2026, hitting .440 with 2 HR, 8 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 8/1/2026, hitting .361 with 6 HR, 27 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/10/2027, hitting .500 with 2 HR, 6 RBI...
Was selected to the 2027 Allstar game...
1/31/2029: Gets a new one-year contract worth $3,785,714 through salary arbitration...
8/25/2029: Signed a contract extension with Port Adelaide, $4,230,000 per year, for 3 years.
Was selected to the 2030 Allstar game...
Injured on 7/7/2031 with a Torn Abdominal Muscle, out for 3-4 weeks...
Hit for the cycle against Chicago on 9/21/2031...
Had 5 hits with 5 RBI against Chicago on 9/21/2031...
5/10/2032: Signed a contract extension with Port Adelaide, $4,790,000 per year, for 4 years.
Had 6 hits with 5 RBI against Rapid City on 6/5/2032...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/12/2032, hitting .520 with 2 HR, 8 RBI...
Was selected to the 2032 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against Shibuya on 7/21/2032...
Injured on 6/5/2033 with a Concussion, out for one week...
Was selected to the 2033 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Portland on 10/2/2033...
Had 6 hits with 0 RBI against Fall River on 5/20/2034...
Was selected to the 2034 Allstar game...
Had 2000th career hit on 8/25/2034, off Lamar Saldivar (PHI)...
Won Player of the Week award on 10/4/2035, hitting .515 with 1 HR, 8 RBI...
4/25/2036: Signed a contract extension with Port Adelaide, $2,380,000 per year, for 4 years.
Had 23-game hitting streak snapped on 6/5/2036...
Injured on 7/4/2036 with a Inflamed Posterior Cruciate Ligament, out for 8 weeks...
